solution_line_template: Before the zap, the wife held {num_cups} cups, each with {ounces_per_cup} ounces of coffee, for a total of {num_cups}*{ounces_per_cup}=<<{num_cups}*{ounces_per_cup}={total_ounces_before_zap}>>{total_ounces_before_zap} ounces of coffee.

After the zap, the coffee cups and their contents were shrunk by 50%, for a total of {shrink_factor}*{total_ounces_before_zap}=<<{shrink_factor}*{total_ounces_before_zap}={total_ounces_after_zap}>>{total_ounces_after_zap} ounces of coffee.
